# GitHub Copilot Instructions for LeafTime Project

## Context7 Integration
Always use Context7 to fetch up-to-date documentation for the libraries used in this project.

## Project Context
This is a React Native project using:
- React Native (latest)
- TypeScript
- React Navigation (v7)
- TanStack Query (v5)
- Zustand for state management
- React Native Reanimated
- Axios for API calls

## Code Guidelines
1. Use TypeScript for all new files
2. Follow React hooks best practices
3. Use functional components
4. Maintain consistent code style with existing codebase
5. Use Context7 to ensure all library usage follows the latest documentation and best practices

## When Generating Code
- Always check Context7 for the latest API references
- Prefer React Navigation v7 patterns
- Use TanStack Query for data fetching
- Follow TypeScript strict typing
- Use Zustand for global state management
